design_philosophy.core_concept: Modern Yellow Pages meets Luxury Concierge
design_philosophy.theme_strategy: Hybrid - Light Mode Base (Trust) with Dark Mode 'VIP' Toggle

headings.usage: Use for all major section headers to convey premium status. Do NOT use for UI labels.

body.usage: Use for all UI text, descriptions, and functional elements.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire body to remove digital flatness.

sections.name: Hero
sections.description: Large typography 'Trouvez l'Expert Idéal' (Find the Ideal Expert). Background: Abstract Gold Waves (Darkened). Centered Search Bar with 'City' and 'Profession' inputs.

sections.name: Categories
sections.description: Asymmetrical grid of 10 categories. Use icons + subtle background patterns. Highlight 'Popular' categories with larger cells.

sections.name: Featured Providers
sections.description: Premium cards showing top-rated providers. Photo on top, details below. Gold star rating.

sections.name: Visual Header
sections.description: Full height on mobile, 60% width on desktop. High-quality portrait of the provider.

sections.name: Info Panel
sections.description: Sticky scrollable panel. Name (Playfair Display), Verified Badge (Gold), Rating, Bio, Services List with Prices, Reviews (Masonry layout).
sections.cta: Floating Action Button (Mobile) / Fixed Card (Desktop) 'Réserver Maintenant'

request_form.description: Clean, distraction-free. Progress bar at top (Gold). Step-by-step form: 1. Service Type, 2. Details, 3. Location/Time, 4. Contact. Use large selectable cards for options instead of dropdowns where possible.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to the top of /app/frontend/src/index.css immediately.
2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Ensure the colors (gold, obsidian) are added to tailwind.config.js if not present.
3. CREATE COMPONENTS: Build the 'ProviderCard', 'BentoGrid', and 'ServiceWizard' components in /app/frontend/src/components/ui/.
4. PAGE IMPLEMENTATION: Create the pages in /app/frontend/src/pages/ (or equivalent router directory).
5. MOCK DATA: Use the provided image URLs for mock data. Do not use placeholders.
6. ANIMATIONS: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and hover effects if available, otherwise use Tailwind transitions defined in index.css.
7. CRITICAL: Ensure 'data-testid' attributes are added to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Do NOT use generic gradients. Use the specified 'Gold Rush' or 'Obsidian Sheen' only.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
Use 2x padding compared to standard designs.
Never use 'Inter' for Headings. Use 'Playfair Display'.
Mobile-first: Ensure touch targets are at least 44px.
